docs.title: Unusually high bill amounts (repeatedly)
docs.text: 'm being harassed by wwireless with unusually high bill amounts. initially i was told it's a fraud of 2 additional lines added to my account without my knowledge. surprisingly the person made the transaction in different state and it was processed by wwireless store without validating identity ( fraud dept representative gave these details on inquiring). i was sent a bill of more than $300. i immediately called customer service and they connected me to fraud dept who assured me that the issue will be taken care next month. i trusted them and this month i got a bill of $2099.88.as soon as i saw this bill amount i tried reaching customer service. their automated ivr is pathetic.... you will be kept in loop. after 30 mins somehow i got access to a representative. he took 10 mins and put me on hold. i waited for another 15 mins after that he hung up phone... i again tried multiple wwirelessempts... after another 60 mins someone from tech support picked and connected me to a billing representative. this time she took another 20 mins and didn't give me proper explanation.i don't know what's going on with my account. i don't have access to my detailed bill (i asked them to lock my account soon after realizing fraud). they are not reachable. i have been put in tremendous stress due to this.i found this community forum online. don't know if there is someone listening me. i'm loosing my patience.solved!go to solution.

docs.title: 6 days and AT&T is NOT unlocking our devices- PAID IN FULL- OUT OF CONTRACT
docs.text: am truly hoping you can help me. i have been with wwireless for over 6 years now. i have been trying to unlock 2 of my phones since this past sunday 3/5. it is now friday 3/10. we paid off both phones in full on sunday ($410 total). they told us to put in an unlock request and it could take up to 48 hours. we put in the request and it came back with an error. although online and when we called it showed both as paid, they said it could take 48 hours to be fully processed in their system. they told us to wait the 48 hours (until tuesday 3/7) and then put in a new request, which we did. it sent both confirmation e-mails which we confirmed within minutes. now it has been almost 72 hours and we have received no unlock codes. we have called wwireless a total of 7 times in the last 6 days to try and resolve this issue. everytime we call, we get a different answer. today they opened up a case and she told me it would be priority but they had no further information. she also informed me that due to so many requests to unlock devices, there was a technical problem with their unlocking system last week and there are a lot of pending requests. over the last 6 days we were not told this once. wwireless has ourmoney, the phones are paid, and it has been 96 hours since they were paid! we were told and have proof and the website says within 48 hours! why is wwireless refusing to unlock my phones?

docs.title: FREE (???) iPhone
docs.text: n november, 2016, i signed up for wsatellite through wwireless and was encouraged to accept the "free" iphone offer which was not promoted in any ads i had seen. i was assured that my cellular bill would not increase because there would be no cost. i agreed to participate and noticed on my december bill increased from $76 to $191. when i phoned to inquirie, the costs were itemized as including a one-time $45 activation fee and i was assured that the january 2017 bill would show a "$650 credit for the iphone which would be drawn down over 20 months" so that i would not pay for the phone.on feb. 19, i called again because not only was there no $650 credit, there was a $21.67 charge for the iphone. i was assured that the next bill (the third since i began with wwireless) would show 3 credits of $21.67 for previous billing and that each bill thereafter would show a $21.67 charge balanced against a $21.67 credit. i asked three times and was told that there would never be a cost to me for the iphone.on feb. 22, i received the third bill which again had no credit and another $21.67 charge for the iphone. when i phoned this time, the first person said there was nothing she could do, so i asked to speak with a manager. she said she could read all the notes on my account stating exactly what i had been promised but that she could not issue a credit. she said she would send my account to another department which has to review claims before issuing credits. she said she could not give me a name or a phone number so that i could follow up and that she also could provide no timetable for wwireless to respond to my claim.this is an unbelievably confusing accounting system, but more importantly, very poor customer service. surely wwireless does not want the reputation of making promises without following through with their customers.can someone please explain this process, why wwireless has provided different responses to the same question, and clear the iphone charges from my account?

docs.title: Desbloqueo de Iphone 5s
docs.text: hi am trying to unlock myiphone 5s wwireless (before iusacell mexico). i send my unlock application and after a week they answered this:"your unlock request was denied because the imei number doesnt match a device thats compatible with the wwireless network". however, this cellphone is from wwireless company, also i checked the imei number three times and it is correct.i need help and a solution, i am overseas trying to use the cellphone, what can i do?thank you.____________hola!estoy intentando desbloquear mi iphone 5s wwireless (antes iusacell mexico), entre a la pagina de desbloqueo que proporcionan me dieron mi numero de confirmacion, espere una semana y al final el resutado fue:"no podemos aprobar tu solicitud porque el numero imei indicado no coincide con ningun equipo registrado actualmente en la red de wwireless".a que se debe esto? si el telefono fue comprado en esta compaia,ademas revise el numero imei tres veces y es el correcto. revise en ajustes el imei, con el codigo de maracion, ademas corrobore que el carrier fuera wwireless.podrian ayudarme, estoy en otra parte del mundo intentando usar el celular con otro campaia y simplemente no puedo.gracias

docs.title: FAN discount promised but NOT honored on AT&T unlimited plan
docs.text: was excited when wwireless offered the two unlimited plans on wireless service. i chwwirelessed with a customer care specialist on 02/27/2017 to enquire if i will be eligible for the fan discount on the new plans. the response was affirmative (reference number:***).i called in customer service to change over to unlimited plan on 03/02/2017 and again confirmed that i only intend to switch over if i will receive the fan discount. the agent confirmed and we discussed the estimated charges to avoid any surprise later on. i could have changed plan online, however i chose to speak to an agent so that i can talk to a person and get this assurance.i was surprised to see that there was no discount when i recieved my bill today. on calling to customer care, they denied honoring anh fan discount, saying its not eligible. i cannot switch back to my old plan which was a promo plan and for the same amount of data i had earlier i would be paying very close to the unlimited rate. i have 8 lines in my plan and before this unlimited plan - i was on paying for 10 gbs, but getting 30 gbs data + 5gb bonus.i feel cheated and this is my first post ever in an online community. i hope wwireless notices this.[edited for privacy-this is a public forum. please do not post personal or unique information such as but not limited to full names, employee id numbers, email addresses, phone numbers, account numbers, etc.]

docs.title: Bait and Switched by Atnt Rep
docs.text: was approached by a rep with an offer. she sold me a promotion in november 2016 - she said if i added a 4th line i'd get unlimited data and if i switched to wsatellite i'd get the new iphone 7 for free. three hours later i upset our cable life and after 20y w time warner i took a leap of faith and signed up. i'd never buy an iphone for my 9y old - but a free phone- signed up. two and three months later i see that i am paying for the iphone?!? thirteen calls later, and two upper level promises that this would be honored i have learned an unfortunate lesson, atnt is awful. they have a tactic whereby you talk to one person and then a supervisor, they send you to "customer retention" and they act like they are helping to get you off the phone. did this whole cycle four times and finally got to yada- she promised this was fixed and she would call me monday. no one ever called. two weeks later i am told that i will not be helped. that say i didn't "port" the line over, i "added" a line and that wasn't the promotion... i told them i don't know anything about porting versus adding asi was signed up through a rep who is supposed to know what she was doing. i will be taking my service to verizon as soon as possible and i will never look back. this was a grueling experience. i was ill over it and now i must let it go. ps i'm a professional and could afford the phone. but i was duped and it is not ok, in fact i am fling a complaint with the ks wwirelessorney general.

docs.title: Begging AT&T!
docs.text: ear wwireless, i am a foreign customer and have repeatedly complained about not being able to log in to my account to pay my bill. i am overseas and need a us number for my customers to reach me. wwireless promised this would not be a problem. thing is, it is not possible to pay my invoice via app, phone or web because of a firewall issue at wwireless. that is confirmed by wwireless. i have raised this issue many, many times and have spent dozens of hours (no kidding!) on the phone with operators ro solve the problem. they could not, even on this forum the wwireless people simply ignore the problem if they cannot solve it. and yes, i can call an operator, explain the problemn for the 40th time, wait a couple of hours to finally being able to pay the bill, but without an invoice. wwireless refuses to send me an invoice. last month i was shut off from services due to a " code not being implemented", i could not call nor could i be reached at my number. i still have to pay the bill for not being serviced. and even then wwireless is frustrating the payment.i am numb now, i tried and tried and tried, the only response from wwireless is that this should not happen, and that they would be glad to sell me another product... wwireless what now? is it normal to beg to pay your own bill? i expect an invoice sent to me via mail, if not, i cannot and wil not pay the bill.

docs.title: Stuck with a phone that I didn't want
docs.text: lost the note 7, so insurance took it upon themselves to send me the s7 active. i hate this phone and was basically told, "too bad." when did customer service get so horrible. i lost the opportunity to get an upgrade and all. this is crazy! i'm considering another carrier, because there's not much difference between them nowadays.

docs.title: Can AT&T employee verify authenticity if I purchase iPhone 7 from third party?
docs.text: an an wwireless employee verify the authenticity of an iphone 7 if i purchased it from a third party? is there a fee?

docs.title: Unlocked iphone 7 plus
docs.text: bought an iphone from best buy during my trip. i am told, it is sim free and universal, but it is sim locked. then i found an american sim card and activate it. unfortunately iphone can not recognize my national sim card. i called apple support team, they said, my phones carrier is wwireless, so i applied to wwireless. however, wwireless denied my application by telling that,"we're unable to approve your request because the imei number provided doesn't match a device that's currently on the wwireless network."my first question, how is that possible?i couldn't believe this answer, because apple told me that, wwireless is the carrier.then i checked again, and apply one more time. wwireless denied it again. then i realized, wwireless says my iphone model is "a1784" which is not. it is "a1661".second question, how is that possible?after all, i would like to ask, how can wwireless find the model number of this iphone? they know only the imei number.

docs.title: Reward Card- Unrelenting diversionary tactics - total obfuscation- total frustration!
docs.text: wwreless rewards card: i was promised a $300. card for new bundled service. i fulfilled all requirements. received a $100. card instead. all efforts to get the $200. difference have been met with complete obstruction. numerous agents all declare i am eligible, two in writing via chat. always directed to a "supervisor"-- whose voice mail box is always full ("good-bye"). out of six calls over one month- consistent lies and several times rude employees. the "rewards" group blames the "sales" side and vice-versa--- each says there is nothing they can do.  pathetic. absolutely pathetic. further insult-- i am an wwireless stock holder.

docs.title: No Service Outer Richmond
docs.text: 'm not getting any phone service in the outer richmond of san francisco 94121 near golden gate park. wondering if any cell towers are not working.

docs.title: Unlock denials leaving me outraged
docs.text: am so frustrated with wwireless. on february 25th, 2017 i paid if two phone lines with my debit card. the funds came out of my account within seconds of the cc transaction. since then, after using the wwireless unlock phone app unsuccessfully and at least 8 different calls with agents i just recently was able to unlock my phone and my son's phone is still locked 11 days later. two days ago, my phone was finally unlocked so i sent my son to the other provider and they ported his number over. now my son's phone is locked between two providers and has no service. the only problem is that he's a marine at camp lejeune, nc about to ship off to okinawa and i can't speak to him. i am beyond upset and cannot believe wwireless is pulling this! now wwireless is saying the request to unlock his phone requires additional research. my phone bill for service is paid and my phones are paid off, what more can you research?

docs.title: incoming calls have + prefix
docs.text: ll incoming calls have a + added at the beginning of the phone number. impossible to return call.

docs.title: Why are you so expensive?
docs.text: 've had wwireless since iphone - day 1. i just switched my iphone to verizon from wwireless after a bunch of years. wwireless coverage was getting worse, terrible plan flexibility and their rates were increasing consistently. verizon unlimited talk, text, data and much better coverage is a full $50 cheaper per month. 50!  when i spoke to wwireless about cost control or plan changes you could not have care any less about trying to keep my business. i noted this on facebook and the response of other people's similar experience causing them to switch also was stunning.

docs.title: HELP - ANYONE HAVE THE DIRECT NUMBER FOR ATT CEO OR PRESIDENTS OFFICE?

docs.title: Being overcharged.
docs.text: ssue for several months now. i have spoken to so many different reps at wwireless. last year during promotion i traded in iphone 6 for iphone 7 which was suppose to be free. wwireless store downtown brooklyn took phone for the trade in promotion. now its almost 5 months in and wwireless is billing for new phone. this is unacceptable. i feel like im being robbed. im being told i cannot get my iphone 6 back. my old phone was in perfect condition. i would have never upgraded if i knew this would be an issue.trade in id #***please help.thank youkb[edited for privacy-this is a public forum. please do not post personal or unique information such as but not limited to full names, employee id numbers, email addresses, phone numbers, account numbers, etc.]

docs.title: Screen went black: Unable to send/receive calls
docs.text: have a galaxy s5 active. last night my screen went black i thought it was just a dead bwwirelessery but it's not. the blue indicator light still works and it vibrates when i assume texts are being received but i cannot see anything nor can i send/receive calls.

docs.title: Unlock Requested 3/3 and as of 3/9 still waiting for APPROVAL
docs.text: s stated above, i requested an unlock on my samsung galaxy s5 on 3/3, submitted the confirmation back to wwireless on the same day, and as of 3/9, i still do not have approval !! i called customer service and they were of no help because the status is "in progress." i tried to resubmit my request, but the system would not allow it because there was already a request "in progress." wwireless claims it may take up to 2 business days.....well, it's way over that time period. help !!! request number is cul325288128300. does anyone out there know what else i can do? doesn't wwireless have a legal obligation to unlock phones within a certain period of time? the phone is fully paid for, there is no contract obligation, what else is holding it up???
